roleset.name: isolating

example.name: both args
example.text: Christopher and Francis [sons of Thos. Hall, of Hornby in Cleveland], beg a certificate from the County Committee of Durham of the cause of their sequestering the lands of John Douthwaite, of Westholme.
example.arg: the lands of John Douthwaite, of Westholme

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, sequester.01. Corresponds to Vncls concealment-16, steal-10.5.
